thread.title: Resolve your Telecom Order Management (TOM) and Billing challenges with ChikPea - Booth W814 at Dreamforce
thread.title_full: Resolve your Telecom Order Management (TOM) and Billing challenges with ChikPea - Booth W814 at Dreamforce

author: admin
title: Resolve your Telecom Order Management (TOM) and Billing challenges with ChikPea - Booth W814 at Dreamforce
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/11/2015 @ 11:14 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ChikPea 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 11, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Meet the team and learn about billing, quoting, telecom order management, subscription management, payments, dunning and collections and discuss how ChikPea's powerful and agile out-of-the-box functionality and 100% force.com native solutions can help your business thrive at next weeks Dreamforce: 15 - 18 September 2015 in San Francisco. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150911/265634 
Visit our Booth W814 (West Moscone) and chat face-to-face with #ChikPea to address your quoting, order management and billing challenges or organize a meeting date and time for a dedicated meeting @dreamforce with us. 
Learn about our success stories with Avero, United Allergy, Comcast, Lifebank and Celgene and understand how ChikPea can address and resolve your billing challenges or telecom order management needs. 
Organize your dedicated in-person meeting with ChikPea HERE ! 
ChikPea was the first to offer the 100% native billing system on the Salesforce platform. ChikPea delivered the first 100% Salesforce Native billing and telecom vertical solution available on the Salesforce AppExchange. 
Learn about Subscriber Relationship Management (SRM) and the solutions designed to reduce cost and increase efficiencies. 100% Agile SRM. 
For more information email us or follow us on Twitter @chikpea_inc . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/resolve-your-telecom-order-management-tom-and-billing-challenges-with-chikpea---booth-w814-at-dreamforce-300141554.html 
SOURCE ChikPea
